choices: at an estate sale looking through old photographs.
1.content:
One day you (if in first person) or a guy named (you fill in the blank) stumbles on his ability or curse depending on how you look at it, to land his consciousness into the body of the person in the photograph he is concentrating on.

Only for whatever reason it only works with photographs, single reproductions of what a camera takes a picture of, not photo copies such as found in magazines and print.
It also only works to enter woman, photographs of women, and puts you/him in that body of the woman at the day that the picture was taken. Maybe before or after the snapshot was taken.


The first time it happened, he, you, or named person was..........
1.title: The first time it happened

12.content:
I was at the local antique store looking for a birthday present for my grandma. She was turning 100 and you could tell if you saw her trying to figure out how to change the channel, or use a cell phone, or a computer. So I thought I'd help her reconnect with a more familiar time a little. Problem was I had yet to find one thing I could afford, who knew such irrelevant things could be so expensive. I was just about to give up when the shopkeeper approached me.

"Hey kid. is there anything I can help you with?" The shopkeeper asked.

"I'm just looking for a present to give my grandma, she's turning 100 in a few days." I replied.

"No fooling?" he asked.

I nodded my head.

The shopkeeper got a big grin on his face. Then dashed into a room in the back of the store and quickly returned with an iron lockbox in hand. He reached into his shirt pocket and pulled out a key. Afterward he opened the box, reveling a small clunky disposable camera. I carefully took the camera in my hands and inspected it. It had a wheel to spin so it must use film. But still, a disposable camera. Sure it looked pretty old, I still doubted that it qualified as an antique.

"I don't know..." I said shyly.

"If your wondering whether this is an antique, trust me it's older than it looks. And this particular camera has seen quite a bit of history if what what I've heard about it is true."

"I don't have much money" I admitted.

"Tell you what kid, I'll give you the camera free of charge if you agree to do a favor for me in the future."

I would have preferred to look around more for something affordable, but there was something unsettling about this man and I didn't want to risk offending him.

"What kind of favor?" I asked.

"Time well tell." The Shopkeeper replied.

What choice did I have.

"Fine"
12.title: at an antique store.

choices: "Try to take photos with the old camera"
122.content:
''Happy Birthday" grandma, I said and give grandma the very old camera.

"than.. Kyu..grandson...it.... Brings back memories.... Of.... The young...age". said grandma stuttering.

Than she said very slowly but I could hear her saying "grandson what use will I have, if I keep this camera, I am already old and do not have energy to even lift this camera
You keep this and it seems to have some old photos remaining, I also have something I have to give you".

She then draw out something from behind her and it looked like an album of some sort.

"This is something That your grandpa has collected throughout his life, I do not know much about this album but your grandpa cherished it very much, Whenever I try asking about this thing, he would not even tell me, but one day I heard him saying that this album is key to the longevity, and one day he was looking at the album and died"
Said grandma.

That was a one hell of a story, you thought as you look at the big album.

"So what is in that album exactly" he asked his grandma

She said "it's just the photos of ancesceters of his, why he cherished it and how he died is a mystery to me, I will just give it to you, I am also going to die in upcoming days, your grandpa loves you more than anyone so that is why I am giving this to you"

You take the album and say goodbye to your grandma and go to home with the camera and album,

The 2 things that will change your life.

You go to your home, and lock the door. you don't know what this album is about, but your very curious about this whole thing.
you put down the album at your desk and started opening it.

In the first page of album you see many types of photos in black-white, there are many photos of your grandpa and grandma relatives.
but one particular photo catches your eye, it is the photo of a women in 30s with her child and man who looked like her husband.
the name of women is written below the photo (joana james), ''joana james, if i am correct that is the name of grandma's mother''.
she has blond hair and a sexy body which perfectly fit with her long and beautiful gown.

''WOW....what a hottie she is, i can't believe my great grandmother was so beautiful'' you said as you look at the photo

As you keep looking at the photo, the world started spinning around you

And when you open your eyes........you see

122112.content:
You go to the bedroom you think is your great grandmother's and sat on the bed then it occurred to you that the baby girl you saw was your grandmother and you're guessing she's about six months old.

You sat on the bed and looked up and saw your great grandmother looking back at you in a mirror.

You suddenly felt strange like a heat was pulsing inside you and then you realised your getting turned on.

You strip down to you're underwear and your great grandfather came in and kissed you and heard him say its been six months my love.

You couldn't do anything but let it happen and by the time you both finished your screaming in pure pleasure.

He left the room and you noticed the photo album and opened it up and found a picture of yourself and then all of a sudden your back in your own body.

You looked back though the family photo album and noticed that your grandmother wasn't an only child anymore.

On one photo you noticed you great grandfather holding your grandmother and your greatmother holding to babies that look like twins with names underneath and realised one is a boy and the other is a girl.

You in shock your a girl now not only that but you look at the photo album and noticed a few things.

ONE) you grandma had a brother and sister now and wasn't an only child anymore.

TWO) your grandmother had four children your three girls a one boy your mum been one of the girls and they all had two children each, so you have six cousins and a sister now.

You realise as you look the family meet up once a year and they all look like they are all close you think "it like a fucking clan" you eventually figured out you have 19 cousins in all.

After getting dressed you make your way downstairs https://cdn.pornpics.com/pics1/2018-03-1... and your mum sees you.

She says... Skye
12211221.title: Leave it for now

13.content:
Walking into the estate sale, you are rumaging through old antiques and photos. You flip through a photo album and your mind is intrigued at a black and white photo of a woman and her child.

You stare at the picture noticing the picture was taken outside of the estate you are walking through. The woman is wearing an elegant gown looking to be from the early 1900's.

Like in most old black and white photos, the subjects are staring blank into the camera. You start wondering what the woman was doing that day. You quickly notice the other pictures around the room and realize the same woman is in many other photos. She must have lived at the house.

You stare again intently at the photo of the woman standing outside the estate when you suddenly feel the room spinning.

Time seems to stop as you suddenly smell fresh flowers and hear birds chirping. You suddenly find yourself outside of the estate you were looking at staring at a man with a tripod camera. "How did I get out here?" You wonder feeling an unfamiliar breeze on your legs.

You quickly notice the estate looks much newer than it did when you walked up. The siding and paint seems almost brand new?

You wonder why this man is taking your picture as you feel that breeze again on your legs? You look down and are shocked to notice you are wearing a dress? "Why do I have a ladies dress on?" You think to yourself seeing the elegant dress on your body.

Your thoughts are suddenly turned to the child’s hands you are holding. You immediately recognize the little girl as the same little girl from the photo you were looking at only moments ago.

You take another look at the dress you have on and remember it was the exact dress the woman was wearing in the photo.

You nervously look at the camera man with a blank stare as you think, “Uh oh….”
13.title: at an estate sale looking through old photographs.

131.content:
For the next few moments, you stare blankly at the photo album wondering what has happened. You somehow have traveled back in time inside the woman’s body you were looking at in the photo album?

The camera man finishes the picture and you stand in shock as he approaches, “Mrs. Kinsley…for the next few photos we will just need your daughter….Why don’t you go inside and grab a lemonade to cool off?”

You nod your head and start walking into the estate. The first thing you notice is how the heavy elegant gown seems to be flowing with every sway of your hips. You wonder how the dress is sticking so far out from your body?
Finally inside you immediately stand in front of the hallway mirror to see you are in fact the woman from the photo.

You turn to the side confused at your reflection and the woman in the mirror reacts exactly the same.
Running your hands down the front of your new dress, you stop at your breasts momentarally and then continue to the front of your gown. Placing your hands over your crotch, you feel nothing through the dress as your eyebrows raise, “Oh crap!” You think verifying you are completely a woman.
131.title: You walk into the estate

choices: Try using the photo album again
1312.content:
Before you can process what is happening, you turn to see a maid asking you a question, “Madam Kinsley…shall I pour you a glass of iced lemonade?”

You stare at the maid realizing she must work for you. “Uh…sure that would be wonderful!” You reply grasping your neck. You are shocked at the feminine sounding voice coming from your body as the maid smiles, “I’ll just be a moment madam…”

You quickly walk down the hallway and finally notice the sound of heels on the wooden floor. You hadn’t realized you were wearing heels during the initial shock of suddenly becoming Mrs. Kinsley. You sneak up to the room you found the photo album and see the same photo album on a desk.

You start paging through the photo album and see a colored picture out of place. It looks very modern and you recognize your former male body in the picture. The picture is of the estate auction you were attending only moments ago. You desperately concentrate on the photo as time seems to stop.

You open your eyes and you are standing across the same room holding the photo album. You look down and realize you are back in your male body in the current year. You drop the photo album in shock wondering what just happened? Had you really spent the last 10 minutes in the past as Mrs. Kinsley?

You look at the album and recognize the photo of Mrs. Kinsley again. You remember posing the photo as Mrs. Kinsley only moments before you were somehow transported back to the future. You stare at Mrs. Kinsley’s dress and remember every detail of wearing it. You remember how heavy and snug the dress felt on your body. You notice the high heels and remember walking down the wooden floor hearing the heels click. Had this really happened?
1312.title: Look around the house

13123.content:
Quickly texting your girlfriend Amanda, you tell her to meet you at the estate auction. 10 minutes later she shows up, “What was so important that I meet you here right away?” Amanda asks.

You quickly tell her about your out of body experience. Amanda stands shocked hearing of your claim to have been inside Mrs. Kinsley’s body for 10 minutes 50 years ago!

You show her the photo album and say, “I’m telling you the truth!”
Amanda rolls her eyes, “Ok smarty pants…Let’s just see if your theory works!”

You open the photo album and point to another picture and say, “Ok…just stare at the photo!”
Amanda follows your lead joking, “Ok…like anything is going to happen!!!”
13123.title: Call your girlfriend

131231.content:
The fog clears, and you begin to smell the flowers and birds chirping again. You look up to see the camera man taking your picture. You recognize the situation as you quickly glance down. You see the ladies gown on your body and sigh knowing you weren’t crazy. You have somehow been transformed into Mrs. Kinsley again!

The camera man approaches you again like the first time and says, ““Mrs. Kinsley…for the next few photos we will just need your daughter….Why don’t you go inside and grab a lemonade to cool off?”

You nod again to the camera man as you glance down at Mrs. Kinsely’s daughter. This time, Mrs. Kinsley’s daughter is wide eyed and looks terrified. Unlike last time when you traveled back in time into Mrs. Kinsley’s body, her daughter was happy and careless.

The daughter looks up at you and mutters, “What is going on!!??”

You then realize your girlfriend must have also traveled through the picture into Mrs. Kinsley’s daughter’s body! You whisper, “Is that you Amanda?”

The little girl nods her head, “Ok ok! I believe you now! I somehow transformed into Mrs. Kinsley’s daughter! What do we do now?”

You giggle to Amanda stuck as a 5 year old girl, “I don’t know? Right now you are supposed to take more pictures with the photographer! Meet me inside when you are done!”

Amanda protests, “What??!! You are just going to leave me out here?”

You bend down to calm your new daughter, “Relax Amanda…I need to learn more about how this is happening! Just come inside when you are done!”

Amanda rolls her eyes, “Fine! But you better figure out how to get us back to our normal bodies!”
131231.title: Something happens

1312311.content:
Just like the first time you transformed into Mrs. Kinsley, you found yourself walking across the lawn feeling the heavy gown swaying back and forth. You stop again at the hallway mirror to admire Mrs. Kinsley’s reflection.

Once again, a maid appears and offers you a glass of lemonade. You smile at her and reply, “Could you please bring my daughter upstairs when she is done taking the photos?”
“Yes Madam Kinsley!” The maid agrees and you head back upstairs.

For the next few minutes, you watch out the window at your girlfriend Amanda posing for more pictures by the camera man.

10 minutes later, Amanda appears in the doorway. You turn to smile at her, “So do you believe me now?”
Amanda finally smiles for the first time, “Ugh! I can’t believe you just left me out there!”

You laugh, “Awwww…you were posing so good for those photos! You looked darling!” You jokingly run your hands through Amanda’s hair giggling.

Amanda rolls her eyes, “I can’t believe it’s really you inside Mrs. Kinsley’s body!! ….And I’m somehow inside her daughter’s body!!!”

You laugh, “I told you the photo album was magic!....it’s like 1950!”

Amanda crosses her arms, “Atleast you are an adult! I’m stuck in this kids body!”

You stand up and show her the photo album. “Look! There is a picture of us in the future in our normal bodies! This is how I transported back last time!”

Amanda looks at the photo, “It captured our exact moment in the photo before we transported into these bodies!”

You nod, “Let’s try and use the photo album again and transfer back to our normal bodies?”

Amanda nods, “Anything to get me out of this body!”
1312311.title: Back inside the Kinsley Estate

13123111.content:
You both stare at the photo of your normal bodies in the future. The room flashes and once again you are transported through time.

You immediately notice the aged room and know it is back to present time. You sigh realzing the transportation worked. You and your girlfriend Amanda are back at the estate auction in the 21st century!

You look up to find Amanda and are shocked to see your normal male body standing next to you. Your former male body says, “What happened to us?”

Looking in the mirror you see that somehow you and Amanda swapped bodies when you returned to the future. You look down at your body recognizing Amanda’s tube top and skirt. “Whoa! We made it back to our normal time…but we are in each other’s bodies!”

Amanda ran her hands down her flat male chest and groaned, “Ugh!! How did this happen?”

You quickly remember the moment before traveling back into the future and staring at the photos. You remember admiring Amanda’s body and not concentrating on your own. You turn to your former male body, “You were concentrating on the photo of me weren’t you? I was concentrating on your photo! That must have caused us to change into each other!”

Amanda nodded, “I guess you are right! I was totally looking at your picture in the photo before we transformed!”
“We need to figure out how to return to our normal bodies!” Amanda said

Your conversation was interrupted by the estate auctioneer walking into the room. You and Amanda nervously look at the auctioneer who picks up the photo album, “Ahh..here it is…this item is next on the auction block!”

You watch in shock as the auctioneer takes the photo album and goes downstairs. Within seconds, the photo album is up for bidding.

“What are we going to do?” You ask Amanda, “We need that photo album to change back to our normal bodies!”
13123111.title: Back to the future

131231111.content:
"We've got to bid," you say to Amanda. She nods her head which used to be yours. You both run into the auction. You hadn't really come here planning to buy anything so you weren't prepared at all.

"Quick, how much do we have?" Amanda asks. You both rummage through your pockets. You manage to pull out $60 between the two of you.

"We'll start the bidding at $25," the auctioneer says. "Do I hear $50?", You raise your hand and the auctioneer acknowledges you. The very next bid blows past the amount of money that you have.

"But ..." Amanda trails off in shock as she realizes that you aren't going to get the photo album.

In no time the album has sold for many times the amount of money that you could have paid for it. Amanda is clearly about to cry in your old body. "Perhaps they'll let us see it," you suggest to Amanda. Her eyes light up at the thought.

The auction is now over. The photo album was the last item. You wander up to the woman who bought it. "Can we just take a quick look at that photo album you bought?" You ask her.
131231111.title: The photo album is auctioned

choices: use the same picture as you did before
look through more photos to use
1312311111.content:
"sure and i'll tell you what if you give me $60 i'll let you keep it."

"ok sure!" you reply

you give her the money and take the album and walk off with amanda and look through the albumn
1312311111.title: She allows it

choices: Ignore him, find the photo album
1312311112.content:
The woman barely acknowledges you as you ask. "No, get out of my way young lady," She snaps in irritation.

You are left standing there with your mouth hanging open as the woman pushes past you. Amanda collapses to the ground and begins to cry. You sit down to think. You can't help but notice Amanda's fantastic legs in front of you. You find yourself starting to examine yourself but you then shake yourself out of it.

"Perhaps it wasn't just that photo album," you halfheartedly suggest. You aren't convinced at all but since that photo album is no longer available to you you feel that you have to try something.

Amanda perks up. She looks at you hopefully. "Let's go find another one." She anxiously suggests. You both get up and go poking through some of the things that you can find. Unfortunately you don't have much luck at all. Everything is already boxed up. People are packing their purchases up. After ten minutes of searching you don't find any photo albums at all.

Finally you look up and see a photograph on the wall. It is the only photograph left that you can see. This particular photo has a young woman in her twenties on it. This one looks to be much newer though still at least forty years old. The woman has a hairstyle and hat that scream of the 70's. You wonder if you can do it again. In desperation you focus on the picture and concentrate.

Just like the previous two times you are suddenly transported to another location. You are still in the house but in a different room. You recognize the room from the estate sale but it looks totally different. You barely have time to register what happened before you hear a voice.

"OK babe," a guy says to you, "Let's go."

You look in his direction and see a young man with a goofy mustache looking at you. He has a big bulky camera in his hand. It looks like he just took that picture that you saw on the wall. From his attire and the rest of the house you presume that it is somewhere in the 70's. You look down at yourself. You find that you are wearing a baggy sweater and some jeans that flare out at the bottom. You can clearly see that you are female but you already suspected as much from the face in the picture.

"Come on, Let's go," the guy says again.

You turn your attention to him. "Where?" you ask. You feel sheepish as you ask but you have no idea what is going on.

"To dinner. Remember?" He asks.

What do you do now?
1312311112.title: She doesn't

13123111121.content:
You don't really want to go to dinner with him so you make an excuse. "Hang on, I forgot something."

He just shrugs and waits patiently. You go upstairs to the same bedroom where you found the return photo in Mrs. Kingsley's body. You get to the same bedroom but the dresser is in a different location. You are a bit dismayed to find that the photo album isn't there.

You almost start to panic but then you reason there must be a return photo somewhere. You go back downstairs.

"Did you get it?" The man asks. You are about to answer him when you see a portrait on that wall. It is Amanda.

You ignore the man and stare at the picture of Amanda. As you concentrate you suddenly are back in Amanda's body.

"It worked," you announce immediately.

"I didn't feel anything," Amanda replied.

"I just became her," you say pointing to the portrait of the girl.

"Let me try," Amanda says. She concentrates on the photo. After a moment she exclaims, "It didn't work!"

"It did for me, perhaps only I can do it?" you say.

"But we both went last time," she pouts. In your body it doesn't exactly work.

"Together. We went together with a photo that had 2 people in it," you reply. "I think we need to find a picture with 2 people in it."
13123111121.title: Ignore him, find the photo album

131231111212.content:
"We looked everywhere but that was the only photo," you say. "Let's go somewhere else to find one."

You both walk out to your car. Since Amanda is in your body, and has her keys you suggest she drive. You both climb into your respective seats.

"I know," Amanda announces. She reaches over to you and pulls her phone out of her purse that you are now carrying. She flips around for a while and then hands you her phone. There is a picture of 2 girls there. You immediately recognize Amanda's younger sister as one of them.

"Use this," she suggests.

"OK, it's worth a try," you admit. "You focus on your sister, I'll focus on the other girl."

She nods her acceptance and you both stare at the photo. After a moment you say, "It isn't working."

Amanda starts to cry. "Perhaps it has to be a real photograph," you suggest. "Like with film and everything. The other two were."

"You think so?" she asks hopefully as she sniffs and wipes away tears. "I hope so, let's go find an album."

"My parents have quite a few of them," Amanda replies. She starts driving to her parents house. You spend most of the car ride thinking about this power and hoping that you can get it to work again. You have your doubts about this theory but figure it is worth a try. The feeling that it has to do with the estate in some way is weighing on you.

Finally you arrive at Amanda's parents house. You've only been here once before as Amanda doesn't live here.

"They should both be at work," Amanda announces as she parks the car. "But if not you'll have to pretend to be me."

You both walk in with a key that Amanda had in her purse. You are relieved when nobody is here. "The old photo albums are back here," Amanda states. She directs you to a bookshelf that has stacks of newer bound photo-books.

You skip over those and root around looking for a traditional film print.
131231111212.title: Leave

1312311112121.content:
You frantically look around for a suitable photo. Amanda starts looking through the photo books. "My parents must have put all the old albums somewhere else. It looks like these were scanned and put in these books."

You aren't deterred, you keep looking. Finally near the bottom of the pile you see one. It is a picture of Amanda when she was in high school. Unfortunately it is just her so it won't serve to swap you both back. It will however tell you if it had anything to do with the estate

"I found one," you exclaim as you hold up your prize. Then less enthusiastically you add, "But it is only you, there aren't two people so we can't swap back with this."

"Then don't bother," Amanda replies.

You look at the photo again. You've decided that you have to try it to know if the power was somehow part of the estate.

The photo is ...
1312311112121.title: You find one

choices: Amanda does not remember staying home for dinner
Amanda does remember staying home for dinner
13123111121211.content:
The world spins around you yet again as you shake your head out of a daze. You manage to hear "Amanda...Get going already!" The teacher motions for you to come over. You are back at graduation, before you could get a chance to think you were being directed towards your seat for the graduation ceremony. Not looking forward to being here longer than necessary You reluctantly wait for the person behind you to fill up the next seat. You were in luck, as you got placed next to a few of Amanda's close friends. They were really excited about finally graduating that whenever the speaker got boring you all would talk to each other to fill in the gaps. This went on for a good hour and a half before finally everything was done. Finally meeting up with Amanda's family, you were able to leave and head to their house.

The car ride consisted of Amanda's parents congratulating whom they thought was their daughter, as well as going and asking you what you wanted to do to celebrate. You simply mention that you wanted to stay home order some Italian or Chinese food. When you got to Amanda's house you immediately went to where you found the albums before and looked for the return photograph. You managed to find it and soon enough you are back with Amanda.

"Woah." You exclaimed.

"What is it?" Amanda asked.

"Well I wanted to test that the power wasn't just linked to the estate, and as it turns out it still works." You explained.

"What did you do?" questioned Amanda.

"Well I sat through all of your graduation ceremony and told your parents that you wanted to stay home for dinner." You tell her.

"I remember that day very clearly and..." Amanda said.
13123111121211.title: Amanda's senior portait

131231111212112.content:
"Well what does that mean?" You asked.

"I'm not quite sure yet, but it seems like you went through the same routine I did while I had graduated. The headache I had, the car ride with my parents, and even down to the albums that I was looking at..." Amanda told you.

"Why did you go and look at the albums?" You continued.

"Well I was looking at how everyone else in my family looked when they graduated." explained Amanda.

"But... now you don't believe you were doing that?" You calmly questioned.

"No, I do but it's something to talk about right? I mean what if that was actually you causing my headache that day and then that was you looking for the return photo." Amanda worried.

"I mean it's quite possible, but it's not worth worrying about because that would mean anytime you get a headache now you'll get a mini-anxiety attack." You said, trying to calm her down. "Look what we can do now is keep this picture swap between us for now and find a way to switch back. Then we can switch whenever we want to, I guess"

"Here, I found a picture with two people in it. It's the picture with....." Amanda eagerly told you.
131231111212112.title: Amanda does remember staying home for dinner

1312311112121121.content:
"Your best friend?" You replied.

"One thing though, this was around a week ago immediately after my parents left to go on vacation. It was me and my two sisters alone for the week." Amanda told you.

"So?" You asked.

"Well...I had an idea. What if we stayed in the photo for a while?" explained Amanda.

"Like... longer than we have before?" You wondered.

"Yeah, like what if we stayed for the whole vacation while my parents were away." Amanda elaborated.

"I mean we could try it, but it'd be a little bit tricky since I'm not going to be one of your sisters or something. Are you sure there wasn't a picture with you and one of them around the same time?" You asked.

"There probably is I just haven't found it yet." Amanda said, a little annoyed.

"Well here let me help you, that idea sounds like fun and we could test out how long these powers last without things getting complicated." You said

Amanda gives you another album to flip through while she finishes looking through the one where she found her & her best friend. Flipping through the pages it seems to be mostly filled with photos of her sisters and occasionally her mom & sisters together. Nearing the end of the album, you start to see pictures of her and her older sister together. You pick out one that looks pretty recent and show it off to Amanda. Amanda shakes her head, telling you that the picture you had was from a month ago and asks if you can find another.

"How about this one?" You ask.

"It's perfect. that's actually the same day a little bit before I took the one with my friend. Alright, so which do you want to pick?"
1312311112121121.title: Mini-Vacation

choices: Amanda wants to head out to the mall
Amanda wants to jog towards the park
13123111121211211.content:
"Let's use the one with your sister" You replied.

"Okay so then now then I'll concentrate on me I guess and you concentrate on my sister" Amanda told you.

"Alright. Here goes." You said, holding Amanda's hand and concentrating on her older sister.

Taking a deep breath as the familiar feeling comes over you. Almost immediately you are caught off-balance and start to fall when Amanda is able to catch you in time. After regaining your balance, you are able to see Amanda's younger sister putting the camera down and heading towards the kitchen. Amanda and you then talked about what to do for the day to pass the time. Amanda wanted to go outside right away, while you wanted to hang out around the house for a while. Eventually you both get to a compromise as you both take turns on deciding what to do.

"Alright so then let's flip a coin then to see who goes first." You said. "Tails."

13123111121211211.title: Amanda and her older sister

choices: Use the return photo and let Kelly in on the secret
131231111212112111.content:
While you head to the mall, Amanda asks you about how you are going to pass yourself off as her sister. "I haven't thought about that yet, I suppose I just thought no one would call me out." You both get to the mall without incident and walk in. Surprisingly, not a lot of people were there, and you both start walking around the mall searching for stores. Amanda dragged you into store after store until she got tired. You and Amanda went towards the Food Court and got some fast food to sit down and eat. While eating, Amanda saw some people eyeing you as they pass by and giving weird looks. Amanda immediately snapped her fingers in front of you to get your attention.

"Hey. Can you stop eating like a pig?" said Amanda

"I can't help it, your sister was hungry before we left and we went to so many stores." You told her.

"That has nothing to do with you making Kelly look like a crazed lunatic." She retorted.

"yeah..." You said, sighing.

"Ugh, go on and finish and let's go." Amanda said.

"Amanda, I'm going to try something real fast." You told her.

"What is it? What are you doing?" asked Amanda.

"I'm trying to concentrate Amanda, can you bear with me for a moment" You answered.

As you focus more, your mind gets immediately flooded with another set of thoughts and memories, Kelly's to be exact. You can recall how she was part of the choir in high school, how she graduated from college as a Art major, and everything up to what she was going to do when you swapped. Amanda and you then turned towards where you had walked in and started to head out. Along the way, Amanda noticed the changes in your behavior right away. Amanda then asked you if you were aware you were acting just like her sister. Amanda noted the way you were walking, to the way you had just reacted when someone calls her sister out on something. She started to ask you about stuff relating to her sister. Amanda was stunned at how you were able to answer most of what she asked correctly. You then asked her if she wanted to go back to her house. Amanda was about to reply, as her phone started ringing. "That should be Natalie"

After a minute Amanda turns to you and says "Well she wants to hang out with me since I told her my parents were gone. So why did you suddenly want to go back to the house?"

"Well, by any chance do you have a picture of you and your sister from today?" You ask

"Why do you ask?" Amanda wondered.

"Well I mean that if we use the return photo, I have a theory I want to test." You tell her.


You and Amanda get back to the house and Amanda rushes upstairs to go and get the return photo. You head upstairs as well, going into Kelly's room. The 'Kelly' part of you was wanting to go towards the desk and start listening to music and draw. You decided it wasn't a bad idea and headed over to Kelly's desk and started to write a note for her. You wondered if writing it would even matter, but you decided to give it a shot. You start writing that she should write or record a memo of what happens to her this week, reasoning that this should be a vacation she would want to remember. You then end the note with the fact that she should meet up with you and Amanda at her parent's house, making sure to give you and Amanda enough time to get ready for her arrival. As you are getting up from the desk you hear the door open and Amanda comes in with the photo. You hear the doorbell ring, and you both quickly use the return photo.

Your vision returns as you are back in the present. You are back in your body and Amanda is in her own. Acting fast, you ask Amanda if she could find the picture of her sister from today lying around. She ran around the house when she finally grabbed a photo of her sister she hadn't seen before from the kitchen. As Amanda was going out of the kitchen, she noticed some of her sister's stuff on the counter. You both were in luck as the picture was indeed timestamped as earlier in the morning. Amanda guessed that her sister might have stopped by her parent's house to get something. As Amanda handed you the picture, you take her towards the living room window to watch the front door. You check the time on your phone and realize it is a couple minutes after the time you had wrote on the note. You start turning away from the window when Amanda spots her sister pulling up to the house. Amanda saw Kelly get out of her car and started walking up to the door. Amanda turns to you and watches, as you concentrate on the photo of Kelly and focus on the current time. You are surprised to open your eyes and find yourself outside with your right hand about to ring the doorbell, when Amanda opens the door for you.

"Well what now?" Amanda asked

You waddle over to a nearby mirror and the reflection confirms your terrible assumptions. You were now Kim Kardashian when she was pregnant. [URL=http://s1175.photobucket.com/user/bfine2525/media/Pregnant/kimkardashianSho wsBikiniBumpAtthePoolinLosAngelese_zpsiqzkabk7.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1175.photobucket.com/albums/r625...[/IMG] [/URL]

You waddle back over to the beach chair and felt a sudden kick. "Man Kim really did gain a lot of weight since she became pregnant. No wonder they have made fun of the weight gain. This belly is enormous." You think to yourself as you rub across the tan belly and Kim's memories slowly rush inside your head. Kim's mother shows up along with her sisters Khloe and Kourtney. They all sit down on the chairs next to you. "So how are you feeling Kim" Kris, Kim's mother asks you. "Well I hate being this fat. I mean I look like an elephant. I also ache due to the swelling." You say to them as you feel weird speaking in Kim's voice. "Well Kim, it will all be worth it in the end. You are just gonna have to deal with the weight gain right now." Her mother says to you. "And I cant stand to even go outside right now because of all the paparazzi making lies, saying that I gained 100+ pounds when I have not gained near that much weight." You again say as the rest of Kim's memories fill in your head.

"Have you found out what you are having?" Khloe asks as she puts a hand on your new pregnant belly. It feels weird to you that somebody wants to touch your pregnant belly and feel it. "We found out we are having a girl and are going to name her North." You say to them as you watch her touch and occasionaly rub your now pregnant belly, wanting her to stop. Your now mother joins in as she feels the belly

What happens next?
155332211.title: Kim kardashian

1553322112.content:
You decided to stand a little bit in the pool. You waddle back into the beach house that you seem to be staying in for the weekend. You remember that Kanye isnt here this weekend because he is out working on a new album. To you, it seems kinda nice to escape your dull life for the life of a real celebrity even if it is a pregnant one. You try to escape Kims family for a few moments since they keep trying to touch your belly. Having to waddle everywhere because of the belly, not having a male extremity, and the constant kicks are just some of the weird feelings you are having to get used to pretty quick to completley act like kim and not your normal self. You waddle back out to the pool area after finishing going to the bathroom as Kim Kardashian for the first time. Kims family is still out there waiting to ask more pregnancy questions. "So Kim, how has it been in bed with kanye now with the pregnancy?" Kourtney asks you as you start to remember how to respond due to your new found memories. "Well it has been pretty rough. Since I have gained all of this weight, I just dont have any energy to anything. The belly also seems to get in the way as well." You say as you remember the experiences. "So how have the cravings been?" Kris asks you. "Well, look at me, I am huge! I can not stop eating. I have started eating a lot of junk food and have blown up like a blimp." You agitatingly say to them. "Let's talk about something other than my pregnant body." You finally say. They all quiet about your pregnancy and eventually head home after getting a few touches to your belly. You get another look at your new pregnant body.

[URL=http://s1175.photobucket.com/user/bfine2525/media/Pregnant/CC397B02-C75 3-4EEC-8E91-B0E66AFD03A9_zpsaegwh6eb.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1175.photobucket.com/albums/r625...[/IMG][/URL]

What happens next?
1553322112.title: You explore it some more

15533221121.content:
You felt really weird to be in the body of Kim Kardashian pregnant
Body. Than you remember that when you look at that
Photo in the magazine you became her.

Then you remember that she had already given birth.
At the time when you were reading the magazine
That means that you have travel back in time somehow
And ended up in the body of Kim Kardashian pregnant body

You look at the reflection in front of you
And you see a beautiful woman with pregnant
Belly and big breast.

You touch the breast and feel really sensitive
"this breast are so heavy" as you touch the breast
You feel the heaviness of it.

You look around You, and it seems no one is here
You could have gone to her hotel room but you want
To test if this power is real.

There is newspaper on top of the table you want to try
Out your power but you also don't want to leave the body
Of Kim, you want to try out living the life of celebrity.

What do you do.........
15533221121.title: Readers choice

info.brief_description: A normal guy finds he has the abnormal ability to poses another body via a photograph.
info.description:
One day you (if in first person) or a guy named (you fill in the blank) stumbles on his ability or curse depending on how you look at it, to land his consciousness into the body of the person in the photograph he is concentrating on.
Only for whatever reason it only works with photographs, single reproductions of what a camera takes a picture of, not photo copies such as found in magazines and print.
It also only works to enter woman, photographs of women, and puts you/him in that body of the woman at the day that the picture was taken. Maybe before or after the snapshot was taken..






Please add! knock yourself out in whatever direction you wish to take this.
info.pretty_title: Picture switch - a body swapping story
